m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Littelfuse's (LFUS) CEO Gordon Hunter on Q3 2015 Results - Earnings Call Transcript Q3 2015 Earnings Conference Call October 28, 2015 11:00 AM ET Executives Gordon Hunter - Chairman, President and CEO Phil Franklin - EVP and CFO Analysts Josh Chan - Robert W. Baird Shawn Harrison - Longbow Research Gary Prestopino - Barrington Research Operator Good day, everyone, and welcome to the Littelfuse Inc.â€™s third quarter 2015 conference call. Today's call is being recorded. At this time, I will turn the call over to Chairman, President, and Chief Executive Officer Mr.
